title: Banas Dairy Website & Radio App Development
description: Providing rural milk producers with access to industry-related information.
key_responsibilities: Led the design and development of the website and radio app.
Managed a team of 8 developers, content creators, and IT professionals.
Implemented SEO and user acquisition strategies.
Collaborated with dairy management and milk producers.
impact: Achieved 6.5 million users on the website, 30% of whom were milk producers.

metrics_kpis.description: Daily active users on the radio app.
